INSTRUCCIONS.ROW2: The object of Sabotage is to score as many points
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW3: as posible before the enemy destroy your gun
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW4: emplacement your gun may be destroyed either by a
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW5: hit from an enemy bomb or by sabotage when enough
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW6: paratrooper have reached the ground. The gun may be
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW7: controlled with the keyboard. Pressing left arrow
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW8: will move the gun counter-clockwise and right arrow
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW9: will move it clockwise, the space bar key will
INSTRUCCIONS.ROW10: fire a shell Firing a shell costs one point.
